meta

GeometryMeta

Defined in src/davinci-eight/dfx/Complex.ts:17

Summary information on the simplices such as dimensionality and sizes for attributes. This same data structure may be used to map vertex attribute names to program names.

name Specifies an optional override of the name used as a key.
